b.com>; Krishna Patel <Krishna.Patel@chalhoub.com>; Haykel Krifa <Haykel.Krifa@chalhoub.com>; Iliyana Gradceska <Iliyana.Gradceska@chalhoub.com>
CC: Vishal Noronha <Vishal.Noronha@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-06-16 17:22
Subject: We'd Love Your Feedback – Voice of Business Survey Now Live
--------------------------------------------------
 

Dear colleagues,

 

I hope this message finds you well.

 

The Voice of Business survey is now live, and we’d greatly appreciate a few moments of your time to share your thoughts on our procurement services. Your feedback is incredibly valuable — it helps us understand what’s working well, identify areas for improvement, and find better ways to support you moving forward.

 

The survey will remain open until 30th June, so please do try to complete it before the deadline.

 

If any members of the procurement team have gone above and beyond, we’d love for you to give them a special shout-out in the survey — those recognitions really do mean a lot.

 

Thank you for your time and continued support.

 

https://chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com/jfe/form/SV_51QykToza4Sd9wG?Q_DL=DmtxMbFi26fYX7W_51QykToza4Sd9wG_CGC_VHv3VztCEM0RFaa&Q_RD=EMD_o2NmMrwkyingMxX&Q_CHL=email <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/fKT-C1BKACLYNPYtLfDhV3jF1?domain=chalhoub.eu.qualtrics.com> 

 

Warm regards,



 

SANGEETHA ABRAHAM	
MANAGER ‑ PROCUREMENT	
M.C.T. FZE	
DUBAI	
‑	
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES	
		
 	
 <https://chalhoubgroup.com/>
